description:
Integrating biochemical models within open-standard simulation ecosystems.

The Modelica Association — Modelica Association.

(12 Sep.'19) Congrats to Bhavye Jain for finishing his GSOC project involving JSBML.

(30 Apr.'19) 5.18.0 has been released!.

(2 Dec.'19) SBML2Modelica can generate Modelica code from an SBML model.

The Modelica Association is a non-profit organization with members from Europe, U.S.A., Canada and Asia. Since 1996, it develops coordinated, open access standards and open source software in the area of cyber physical systems. Current Modelica Association standards:.

Functional Mock-Up Interface (FMI).

||| CORRECT NAME OF TOOL COULD ALSO BE 'IMPLEMENTATION:SBML2Modelica'
name: SBML2Modelica
